document_notes.text:
This update for jdom2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-33813: XXE issue in SAXBuilder can cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request (bsc#1187446)

notes.text: An XXE issue in SAXBuilder in JDOM through 2.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 SP2:jdom2-2.0.6-3.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 SP3:jdom2-2.0.6-3.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
